object.name: Stim_ImpactDamage
object.desc: Stim params for bullet that does damage to the target (the main 'bullet' for a shotgun). It?s generated at the center of a shot

field.name: fPiercingMultiplier
field.desc: Multiplies the pierce resistance of any material a bullet collides with. A value lower than 1 means the weapon will penetrate more effectively

field.name: fPiercingMultiplierMP
field.desc: Multiplayer specific version of the piercing multiplier

object.name: BaseDamage
object.desc: Stim params for bullet that does damage to the target (the main 'bullet' for a shotgun). It's generated at the center of a shot

object.name: MuzzleStims
object.desc: The list of Stims that a weapon produces when it is fired (Ex: Sound steam)

object.name: ImpactStims
object.desc: The list of primary stims that the weapon produces at the point of impact (inflicts damage from the gun).

object.name: VictimStims
object.desc: The list of stims that weapon produces for the victim These are additional stims that can be called when the weapon hits a target. USE WITH CAUTION!

field.name: BulletWhizRadius
field.desc: The radius of the bullet whiz sound around the weapon line of fire that causes the AI to react.

object.name: RangeMultiplierCasual
object.desc: RangeMultiplier list for casual difficulty level

object.name: RangeMultiplierExperimented
object.desc: RangeMultiplier list for Experimented difficulty level

object.name: RangeMultiplierHardcore
object.desc: RangeMultiplier list for Hardcore difficulty level

object.name: RangeMultiplierInfamous
object.desc: RangeMultiplier list for Infamous difficulty level

field.name: bUseAngleSpread
field.desc: Determines if the weapon should use a bullet spread like a shotgun. USE WITH CAUTION!

field.name: iBulletsShot
field.desc: How many bullets used per shot, most weapons use 1 but others like shotguns use more. The limiting factor is performance

field.name: iBurstLength
field.desc: For FullAuto fireRateMode. Determines length of the bullet queue. If more than 0 ? burst mode enabled (M16 style)

field.name: fAngleYawBulletSpread
field.desc: Controls the horizontal deviation of the primary shot from a shotgun. USE WITH CAUTION!

field.name: fAnglePitchBulletSpread
field.desc: Controls the vertical deviation of the primary shot from a shotgun. USE WITH CAUTION!

field.name: bHasMuzzleLight
field.desc: Determines whether or not muzzle lights are rendered . - DEPRECATED

field.name: fGroupingFactor
field.desc: Affects how the spread tends to be grouped together. The higher this number the more grouped the bullets will be. It's basically an exponential factor over the resulting angle spread (how many times it is multiplied by itself). The more you multiply the spread with itself (0 to 1 probability) the more it will tend towards (center) and thus be more grouped towards the center.

object.name: Stim_ImpactDamageSecondary
object.desc: This variable determines how much damage the secondary stims in shotgun spreads will do individually. The secondary stims are generated in a circle around the center impule, randomly spread out

object.name: BaseDamageSecondary
object.desc: This variable determines how much damage the secondary stims in shotgun spreads will do individually. The secondary stims are generated in a circle around the center impule, randomly spread out

object.name: SecondaryImpactStims
object.desc: List of secondary impact stims that are also affected by the range multipliers..

field.name: fSecondaryAngleYawBulletSpread
field.desc: Controls the horizontal deviation of the secondary shots from a shotgun. USE WITH CAUTION!

field.name: fSecondaryAnglePitchBulletSpread
field.desc: Controls the vertical deviation of the secondary shots from a shotgun. USE WITH CAUTION!

field.name: fSecondaryGroupingFactor
field.desc: Affects how the spread tends to be grouped together. The higher this number the more grouped the bullets will be. It's basically an exponential factor over the resulting angle spread (how many times it is multiplied by itself). The more you multiply the spread with itself (0 to 1 probability) the more it will tend towards (center) and thus be more grouped towards the center.

object.name: RangeMultiplierCasual
object.desc: RangeMultiplier list for casual difficulty level

object.name: RangeMultiplierExperimented
object.desc: RangeMultiplier list for Experimented difficulty level

object.name: RangeMultiplierHardcore
object.desc: RangeMultiplier list for Hardcore difficulty level

object.name: RangeMultiplierInfamous
object.desc: RangeMultiplier list for Infamous difficulty level

field.name: sndEmptyWeapon
field.desc: Parameter for First Person: Sound triggered when weapon is empty

field.name: sndtpEmptyWeaponType
field.desc: Parameter for First Person: Type of Sound to be triggered when weapon is empty

field.name: sndDudBullet
field.desc: Parameter for First Person: Sound triggered when weapon fires a dud bullet

field.name: sndtpDudBulletType
field.desc: Parameter for First Person: Type of Sound to be triggered when weapon fires a dud bullet

field.name: sndMalfunctionSingleBulletShot
field.desc: Parameter for First Person: (Single shot) Sound to be triggered when weapon has already fired a dud bullet and is in malfunction state

field.name: sndtpMalfunctionSingleBulletShotType
field.desc: Parameter for First Person: (Single shot) Type of Sound to be triggered when weapon has already fired a dud bullet and is in malfunction state

field.name: sndHitPlayerSound
field.desc: Sound played for 1st person players when a hit is successful

field.name: sndHitPlayerHeadSound
field.desc: Sound played for 1st person players when a hit to the head is done

field.name: sndmlDistanceFromShootingSoundToPlayerMultilayer
field.desc: Parameter for First Person: Distance from shooting sound to player. Player obtained from the first terminal

field.name: sndSingleBulletShot
field.desc: Parameter for First Person: Single shot sound id

field.name: sndSingleBulletShot
field.desc: Parameter for IronSight: Single shot sound id

field.name: iLastFewShotNumber
field.desc: Determine the number of last shot the FewShotSound will be triggered

field.name: sndMalfunctionStartAutoBulletShot
field.desc: Parameter for First Person: (Auto shot) Sound to be started when weapon has already fired a dud bullet and is in malfunction state

field.name: sndMalfunctionStopAutoBulletShot
field.desc: Parameter for First Person: (Auto shot) Sound to be stopped when weapon has already fired a dud bullet and is in malfunction state

field.name: sndtpMalfunctionAutoBulletShotType
field.desc: Parameter for First Person: (Auto shot) Type of Sound to be triggered when weapon has already fired a dud bullet and is in malfunction state

field.name: fAutoBulletShotFadeOutMultiplier
field.desc: Parameter for First Person: Coefficient for fade time calculation

field.name: fAutoBulletShotMinFadeOut
field.desc: Parameter for First Person: The lowest limit for fading time

field.name: sndAutomaticFireRateSound
field.desc: Automatic Fire Rate Sound id

field.name: sndtpAutomaticFireRateSoundType
field.desc: Automatic Fire Rate Sound type

field.name: sndSingleBulletShot
field.desc: Parameter for Third Person: Single shot sound id

field.name: sndtpSingleBulletShotType
field.desc: Parameter for Third Person: Single shot sound type

field.name: sndStartAutoBulletShot
field.desc: Parameter for Third Person: Auto shot start sound id

field.name: sndStopAutoBulletShot
field.desc: Parameter for Third Person: Auto shot stop sound id

field.name: sndtpAutoBulletShotType
field.desc: Parameter for Third Person: Auto shot sound type

field.name: sndswtpCloseFarSoundSwitchType
field.desc: Close-Far sound switch type

field.name: sndswvlCloseSoundSwitchValue
field.desc: Close sound switch value

field.name: sndswvlFarSoundSwitchValue
field.desc: Far sound switch value

field.name: fCloseFarSoundSwitchDistanceThreshold
field.desc: Close-Far sound switch distance threshold

field.name: psMuzzleParticlesId
field.desc: FX for muzzle flash in first person

field.name: psMuzzleParticlesId_IronSight
field.desc: FX for muzzle flash in first person Ironsight

field.name: psMuzzleParticlesId_3rd
field.desc: FX for muzzle flash in third person

field.name: psMuzzleParticlesDudId
field.desc: FX for muzzle flash when weapon has fired dud bullet in first person

field.name: psMuzzleParticlesDudId_3rd
field.desc: FX for muzzle flash when weapon has fired dud bullet in third person

field.name: psMuzzleParticlesMalfunctionId
field.desc: FX for the muzzle flash when a weapon is malfunctioning in first person

field.name: psMuzzleParticlesMalfunctionId_3rd
field.desc: FX for the muzzle flash when a weapon is malfunctioning in third person

field.name: psBarrelSmokeMuzzleParticlesId
field.desc: FX for barrel smoke post muzzle flash

field.name: fMuzzleScaleIronsight
field.desc: Scale of the muzzle particles when in ironsight.

field.name: fMuzzleScaleFar
field.desc: Scale of the muzzle particles when in ironsight.

field.name: fMuzzleNearDistanceTP
field.desc: Scale of the muzzle particles when in ironsight.

field.name: fMuzzleFarDistanceTP
field.desc: Scale of the muzzle particles when in ironsight.

field.name: MuzzleBone
field.desc: Name of the muzzle bone for FX to attach to on the weapon mesh

field.name: LaserScopeBone
field.desc: Name of the laser scope bone for FX to attach to on the weapon mesh

field.name: psBulletCaseParticleId
field.desc: Bullet particle FX

field.name: BulletCaseBone
field.desc: Name of the the bullet casing bone for FX to attach to on the weapon mesh

field.name: psShineParticleId
field.desc: Sniper Shine FX

field.name: psUnderwaterBulletParticleId
field.desc: Underwater Bullet FX

field.name: fUnderwaterBulletMinAngle
field.desc: Minimum angle between water normal and bullet dir for Underwater FX to appear

field.name: fUnderwaterBulletMinDistSquared
field.desc: Minimum distance between water surface and bullet hit pos for Underwater FX to appear

object.name: BulletSpread
object.desc: Noise spread is used if useAngleSpread is false. Controls how much the bullets spread when fired. Note this value is a set amount, it is not additive, so the spread pops to this amount immediately

object.name: BulletSpread_ironSight
object.desc: Noise spread is used if useAngleSpread is false. Controls how much the bullets spread when fired from standing Ironsights. Note this value is a set amount, it is not additive, so the spread pops to this amount immediately.

object.name: BulletSpread_crouch
object.desc: Noise spread is used if useAngleSpread is false. Controls how much the bullets spread when fired from a crouch. Note this value is a set amount, it is not additive, so the spread pops to this amount immediately.

object.name: BulletSpread_crouch_ironSight
object.desc: Noise spread is used if useAngleSpread is false. Controls how much the bullets spread when fired from crouching Ironsights. Note this value is a set amount, it is not additive, so the spread pops to this amount immediately.

field.name: fBase_spread_transition_time
field.desc: Time it takes for spread transition while base spread changed. Ex: from crouch to stand

field.name: fMax_spread_bullet_number
field.desc: Noise spread is used if useAngleSpread is false. Spread will be increased by each bullet and achieve maximum spread while given bullet will be shot.

field.name: iReticleFadeOutMaxBulletNumber
field.desc: Max bullet number before the reticle fades out.

field.name: fShooting_expansion_speed
field.desc: Controls how fast the reticle expands after each bullet. WARNING ? THERE IS NO EXTERNAL FEEDBACK FOR THIS VALUE, AND IT CAN RADICALLY AFFECT THE AIMING BEHAVIOR OF WEAPONS.

field.name: fShooting_contraction_speed
field.desc: Controls how fast the reticle contracts after shooting. WARNING ? THERE IS NO EXTERNAL FEEDBACK FOR THIS VALUE, AND IT CAN RADICALLY AFFECT THE AIMING BEHAVIOR OF WEAPONS.

field.name: fBulletSpread_jump
field.desc: Noise spread is used if useAngleSpread is false. Controls how much the targeting reticle spreads when the player jumps. Note that the player can?t fire while jumping, but the reticle behaviour is very evident to the player.

field.name: fBulletSpread_jump_modifier
field.desc: Noise spread is used if useAngleSpread is false. Controls how much the bullets spread when fired while the Player is jumping

field.name: fBulletSpread_jump_stabilization_time
field.desc: Controls how long it takes to reset back to perfect aim in-between shots. WARNING ? THERE IS NO EXTERNAL FEEDBACK FOR THIS VALUE, AND IT CAN RADICALLY AFFECT THE AIMING BEHAVIOR OF WEAPONS.

field.name: fBulletSpread_movement_modifier
field.desc: Noise spread is used if useAngleSpread is false. Controls how much the bullets spread when fired while the Player is moving

field.name: fBulletSpread_movement_stabilization_time
field.desc: Controls how long it takes to reset back to perfect aim in-between shots. WARNING ? THERE IS NO EXTERNAL FEEDBACK FOR THIS VALUE, AND IT CAN RADICALLY AFFECT THE AIMING BEHAVIOR OF WEAPONS.

field.name: fBulletSpread_turn_modifier
field.desc: Noise spread is used if useAngleSpread is false. Controls how much the bullets spread when fired while the Player is turning

field.name: bBulletSpread_clamp_spread
field.desc: Whether the weapon should clamp the spread value to the max spread allowed during the current state (jumping, crouch etc.). If false, all spread actions add up and can go beyond the max spread (ex.: shooting while moving).

field.name: sShootRumbleEffect
field.desc: The name of the effect in the player cameraShakeAndRumble list used when shooting.

field.name: bReflexFire_enabled
field.desc: If true this turns on aim assist when shooting from the hip. Bones will be targeted on NPCs when they fall within the reticule.

field.name: bReflexFireOnlyOnSecondary
field.desc: Tick to only apply on secondary bullets instead of primary bullets.

field.name: fReflexFireMinLookSpeedToActivate
field.desc: The minimum speed the camera must be turning at to enable the reflex fire.

field.name: fReflexFireMinMoveSpeedToActivate
field.desc: The minimum speed the player must be moving at to enable the reflex fire.

field.name: fReflexFire_spread_factor
field.desc: This scales the spread of the aim assist targeting as a factor of the current spread, which in itself is used for the reticule.

field.name: fReflexFireDamageLevelMultiplier
field.desc: Scale the damage level for reflex fire shots.

field.name: fReflexFireZiplineSpreadFactor
field.desc: This scales the spread of the aim assist targeting as a factor of the current spread on a zipline, which in itself is used for the reticule.

field.name: fReflexFireJumpSpreadFactor
field.desc: This scales the spread of the aim assist targeting as a factor of the current spread when jumping, which in itself is used for the reticule.

field.name: fReflexFireMouseSpreadFactor
field.desc: This scales the spread of the aim assist targeting as a factor of the current spread when using a mouse. Multiplied by all existing spread factors.

field.name: fReflexFireZiplineDamageLevelMultiplier
field.desc: Scale the damage level for reflex fire shots on a zipline.

object.name: FirstPerson
object.desc: First person bullet tracers

object.name: Friendly
object.desc: Bullet tracers output by friendlies

object.name: Enemy
object.desc: Bullet tracers output by enemies

field.name: matimpShellImpactFx
field.desc: FX for shell in the point of impact

field.name: matimpBulletImpactFx
field.desc: FX for the bullet in the point of impact

field.name: matimpSecondaryBulletImpactFx
field.desc: FX for the shotgun-like point of impact

field.name: matimpBloodBulletImpactFx
field.desc: FX for the bullet in the point of impact when it has caused a hit on someone it passed through before.

field.name: matimpDeathBulletImpactFx
field.desc: FX for the bullet in the point of impact when it has killed the target or someone it passed through before.

field.name: fBloodBulletMaxDist
field.desc: Max distance a bullet can carry a blood effect with it.

field.name: fOverallMinParticleScale
field.desc: Minimum Bullet Impact Overall Particles Scale

field.name: fOverallMaxParticleScale
field.desc: Maximum Bullet Impact Overall Particles Scale

field.name: fOverallDecalScale
field.desc: Bullet Impact Decals Scale

field.name: fBulletImpactScaleSmallDistance
field.desc: Distance (Between Player and Impact) at which the Bullet Impact will get the Small Scale Multiplier.

field.name: fBulletImpactScaleMediumDistance
field.desc: Distance (Between Player and Impact) at which the Bullet Impact will get the Medium Scale Multiplier.

field.name: fBulletImpactScaleLargeDistance
field.desc: Distance (Between Player and Impact) at which the Bullet Impact will get the Large Scale Multiplier.

field.name: fSmallBulletImpactScaleFactor
field.desc: Bullet Impact Scale Factor for Small Range.

field.name: fMediumBulletImpactScaleFactor
field.desc: Bullet Impact Scale Factor for Medium Range.

field.name: fLargeBulletImpactScaleFactor
field.desc: Bullet Impact Scale Factor for Large Range
